==Content Toggle Rule==
If you want to toggling display of content box. Follow here example.

{{{
<a href="#CONTENT" data-toggle="#CONTENT">...</a>
<div id="CONTENT">...</div>
}}}

or you can

{{{
<button type="button" data-toggle="#CONTENT">...</button>
<div id="CONTENT">...</div>
}}}
